title: Cant uninstall PBE
body:
After i started my PBE the ingame  download took about 4 hours and still wasn´t finished, so I decided to reinstall it. But when i went to my Programms and wanted to uninstall it, an error came, that the PBE.dat file cannot be found.
I also tried a uninstall tool but  it didn´t work 

pls help

replies.body: If you happened to grab the newer PBE installer, it should have come with an uninstall tool. If you still have the previous version no worries. You can manually delete everything related to PBE and then run something like [**CCleaner**](https://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/download) to get rid of any remaining registry files.
